text: Found a thread on Reddit discussing this issue. Post October 2023 Windows Explorer keeps crashing. I first noticed this when my taskbar kept freezing, then I discovered that I couldn't open any folders on my desktop and the error below is generated. Is anyone else seeing this? Restarting explorer.exe temporarily restores the taskbar. Faulting application name: explorer.exe, version: 10.0.22621.2428, time stamp: 0xaab5a73e <

metadata.topic: Windows 11 22H2 October 2023 Updates, Explorer Keeps Crashing
